body:
Hi, _Za here.

As we all know, the Omega Update is here and there are now 'credits' which has replaced the ranks plus XP for prestiges.

However, many of the items that you can buy in the Credit shop may take a long time, so I am suggesting that you are able to buy Credits with money.

This is what I am thinking as a set up for this:

500 Credits: £3
1000 Credits: £5
2500 Credits: £10
5000 Credits: £15 (Recommended)
10000 Credits: £30
50000 Credits: £125

Please feel free to write responses below on this.

Thanks,
_Za
